channel.title: The Gideon Chronicles
channel.description: The Gideon Chronicles — A Podcast Novel for 11-14-year olds. Gideon, a 12 year-old meets Satan. His life is turned upside down. Keep the light ON!
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast Novel for 11-14-year olds. Gideon, a 12 year-old meets Satan. His life is turned upside down. Keep the light ON!
channel.itunes:author: Duncan Bouwer
channel.itunes:summary: The Gideon Chronicles — A Podcast Novel for 11-14-year olds. Gideon, a 12 year-old meets Satan. His life is turned upside down. Keep the light ON!

item.title: Chapter 1: Things Fall Apart
item.description: Things Fall Apart: Gideon's cute little life shows some cracks. A Dark Presence sneaks in and Gideon gets a job to do... Can he refuse? His choice will have everlasting consequences. KEEP THE LIGHTS ON
item.dc:creator: Duncan Bouwer
item.itunes:summary: Things Fall Apart: Gideon's cute little life shows some cracks. A Dark Presence sneaks in and Gideon gets a job to do... Can he refuse? His choice will have everlasting consequences. KEEP THE LIGHTS ON

item.title: Chapter 4-5: Powers and Principalities & The Dark Covenant
item.description: Things begin to get serious. Gideon finds out what's behind the door at "The House". Petra has no peace until she knows what's happening to Gideon.
item.dc:creator: Duncan Bouwer
item.itunes:summary: Things begin to get serious. Gideon finds out what's behind the door at "The House". Petra has no peace until she knows what's happening to Gideon.

item.title: Chapter 3: Will Friday Never Come?
item.description: In Which Gideon begins to set his Plan in motion. In which Friday finally comes.
item.dc:creator: Duncan Bouwer
item.itunes:summary: In Which Gideon begins to set his Plan in motion. In which Friday finally comes.

item.title: Chapter 2- A Job to do
item.description: In Which Gideon formulates and initiates his plan to trash Petra the Christian Pain. In which Gideon meets the "Gang" and get invited out...
item.dc:creator: Duncan Bouwer
item.itunes:summary: In Which Gideon formulates and initiates his plan to trash Petra the Christian Pain. In which Gideon meets the "Gang" and get invited out...
